Dependancies¶

  • Python3 >= V3.5.3

    • including modules csv and yaml

  • Snakemake >= V4.8.0

  • Slurm >= V0.4.3

  • Singularity >= V2.5.1

Admin rights are needed to build the AllMine’s Singularity container.
